lead_paragraph: The United States Olympic Committee added the president of Xerox and the chairman of a multibillion-dollar entertainment company to its board Wednesday, one step in the process to find a replacement for the chairman, Peter Ueberroth.
snippet: The United States Olympic Committee added the president of Xerox and the chairman of a multibillion-dollar entertainment company to its board Wednesday, one step in the process to find a replacement for the chairman, Peter Ueberroth.
